name: PR1$0NER
description:
PR1$0NER | About

Prisoner is a platformer game where you need to escape trought the level and get to the end but you have control over the traps and the platforms. Yes, you can rewind the time and make the environement move in reverse.  The game was made in 7 days for Brackeys' fourth game jam.

PR1$0NER | Controls

We currently offer support to Keyboards and Mouse Inputs, but we're planning to extend the experience to Gamepads. You can move the character left-right with A-D keys, make it jump with Space key and sprint/reverse time with Left Shift key.

PR1$0NER | Team

We are three italian developers but only two of us worked in this Project. Samuele Guerrini has worked as a Designer and as a Programmer, Andrea Lunghi has worked on the main graphics and has done some coding stuff.
